profile.title: Tus Neeg Siv Tus Kheej
profile.mustLogin: Koj yuav tsum nkag mus ua ntej thiaj pom tau qhov chaw teeb tsa.
profile.autoTranslate: Txhais lus rau cov lus xa tawm los ntawm nws tus kheej
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Qhia qhov qub thiab qhov txhais ua ke
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Qhia qhov qub thiab qhov txhais ua ke rau ib sab
profile.filterExplicit: Lim tawm cov ntsiab lus tsis tsim nyog
profile.enableReadReceipts: Qhib kev paub thaum tau nyeem lawm
profile.allowExplicitContent: Pub cov ntsiab lus tsis tsim nyog
profile.disappearingMessages: Qhib cov lus yuav ploj mus tom qab
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Vaj huam sib luag ploj tom qab vib nas this
profile.saveSuccess: Cov kev teeb tsa tau khaws cia lawm!
profile.saveError: Yuav tsis khaws tau: muaj kev ua yuam kev
profile.avatarError: Muaj kev ua yuam kev thaum xa daim duab
profile.noPrivateKey: Tsis muaj tus yuam sij ntiag tug hauv no ntaus ntawv.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tso ib lo lus zais rau kev thaub qab:
profile.backupDownloaded: Tau rub tawm tus thaub qab uas tau muab zais.
profile.exportFailed: Kev xa tawm tus yuam sij tsis tiav
profile.enterBackupPassword: Sau lo lus zais rau qhov thaub qab no:
profile.importSuccess: Tus yuam sij ntiag tug tau nkag rau hauv no ntaus ntawv lawm.
profile.importFailed: Kev nkag yuam sij tsis tiav (lo lus zais tsis raug lossis ntaub ntawv puas).
profile.keysRotated: Tsim ob tus yuam sij tshiab thiab xa tawm tus pej xeem yuam sij.
profile.rotateFailed: Kev hloov yuam sij tsis tiav.
profile.exportKey: Xa tawm tus yuam sij ntiag tug
profile.importKey: Nkag tus yuam sij thaub qab uas tau muab zais
profile.keyDisclaimer: Koj tus yuam sij ntiag tug yeej tsis tawm hauv no ntaus ntawv. Xa ib daim thaub qab uas muaj lo lus zais kom rov siv tau ntawm lwm ntaus ntawv.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Koj nyob rau hom Dawb— siv cov kev xaiv Hnub / Hli hauv qab no. Hloov mus rau hom siab dua kom qhib tau ntau yam kev zoo nkauj ntxiv.
profile.backupTitle: Kev Thaub Qab & Kev Sib Phim Ntaus Ntawv
profile.openBackupTools: Qhib cov cuab yeej thaub qab
profile.backupDesc: Tsim kev thaub qab uas muaj lo lus zais rau koj cov yuam sij, thiab rov siv tau rau lwm lub ntaus ntawv kom sib phim.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Ua rau cov lus xob tom qab los ntawm kev xaiv ua ntej
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Ua xob thaum daim ntawv thov tsis raug xaiv
profile.notifyOnCopy: Qhia kuv thaum kuv cov lus raug luam tawm
profile.loadFailed: Tsis ua tiav rau kev thauj tus kheej
profile.unfollowFailed: Tsis tso tseg tau kev ua raws
profile.followHint: Lawv zaj dab neeg yuav tshwm hauv koj daim ntawv ua raws yog lawv tshaj tawm rau cov neeg ua raws lossis pej xeem.
profile.sectionCrashedTitle: Qhov seem no tsis qhib tau
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Muaj teeb meem tshwm sim hauv qhov seem no.
profile.forwarding: Hu & Lus xa mus rau lwm tus
profile.callTextForwardingSection: Hu & Lus xa mus rau lwm tus
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Hu thiab / lossis Lus xa mus rau lwm tus
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Xa cov kev hu thiab cov lus tuaj rau koj tus xov tooj lossis email uas tau txheeb xyuas lawm. Cov kev hu / lus tawm tuaj yuav qhia koj tus lej Chatforia.
profile.enableTextForwarding: Qhib kev xa lus mus rau lwm tus
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Xa cov lus mus rau xov tooj
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Xa cov lus mus rau email
profile.destinationPhone: Tus xov tooj uas yuav txais (E.164)
profile.enableCallForwarding: Qhib kev xa kev hu mus rau lwm tus
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Tus xov tooj uas yuav txais kev hu (E.164)
